==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Tepache:''' There's nothing more fun than leaping up high, before feeling the weightlessness of your fall.
:'''Tepache:''' Hey there! What would you say to trying out my [[Warrior's Challenge]]?
:{{DIcon|Warrior's Challenge}} Let's begin!
:;(Opens Warrior's Challenge interface)
:{{DIcon}} Give me a moment to prep...
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
''Available during the Warrior's Challenge''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Tepache:''' You can use [[Jet-Set Eddies]] to reach high places, and it's quite the experience to boot. Be careful when you land in the water, though.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{W|Tepache}} is a fermented pineapple beverage from Mexico. ''Tepiātl'' means "drink made from corn" in Nahuatl, as it was originally made with corn instead of pineapple.
